mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RM,HUMAN.* FROM(SELECT articleNum,id,title,to_char(writeDate,'YYYY-MM-DD')as writeDate,depth,hit,fileStatus, (select count(*) from comments where helpArticle.articleNum=comments.articleNum)as commentCount FROM helpArticle START WITH groupId=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR articleNum=groupId ORDER SIBLINGS BY articleNum DESC)HUMAN ) WHERE RM BETWEEN #{startRow} and #{endRow}
